_qaQmi3GPPBroadcastCfgInfo Struct Reference

This structure contains the 3GPP Broadcast Configuration Information parameters. More...

#include <qaGobiApiSms.h>

Data Fields

BYTE activated_ind
WORD num_instances
struct BroadcastConfig broadcastConfig [CONFIG_LEN]

Detailed Description

Parameters:
activated_ind 
  • Broadcast SMS
    • 0x00 - Deactivated
    • 0x01 - Activated
num_instances 
  • Number of sets (N) of parameters Following each set describes one entry in the broadcast configuration table.
    • fromServiceId
    • toServiceId
    • selected
broadcastConfig 
  • A BroadcastConfig structure array.
  • Further defined by the structure BroadcastConfig
